sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
helpful
, nam pomaga tako, da za nas opravi neko delo ali nam da nasvet ali podatke.

seg.quote: They were all very pleasant and extremely kind and helpful.
Doctor Percival said helpfully, ‘I'd advise you not to go’.
I was greatly impressed by the efficiency and helpfulness of the stage crew.

sense.def:
Kar je
helpful
, naredi določene okoliščine prijetnejše ali znosnejše.

seg.quote: It is often helpful during an illness to talk to other sufferers.
